description.x-y:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack,
Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack,
Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and

effect.full: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
